pkgmetadata.longdescription: Inverse Estimation/Calibration Functions // Functions to facilitate inverse estimation (e.g., calibration) in linear, generalized linear, nonlinear, and (linear) mixed-effects models. A generic function is also provided for plotting fitted regression models with or without confidence/prediction bands that may be of use to the general user. For a general overview of these methods, see Greenwell and Schubert Kabban (2014) doi:10.32614/RJ-2014-009.
